Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the HEK293 cell line expressing wild-type and mutant PLEK2.

Readout description.Result Description: Protein expression was reduced by 30% for the variant NM_016527.3:c.489G>A compared to wild-type.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type PLEK2 was used as a positive control.

Validation controls B/LB.Description: One control with a benign variant was used.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 80% relative to wild-type.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 50% relative to wild-type.
